step.cmd: Find the arrows forming semi-circles on the far left side of OneNoteâ€™s Home tab.
Click on the arrow turning counterclockwise to Undo an action.
Continue clicking on the Undo arrow to undo more of your previous actions, starting with the most recent actions first.
Click on the arrow turning clockwise to Redo an action you have undone.
Continue clicking on the Redo arrow to redo more of your undone actions, starting with the most recently undone actions first.
step.info: Note: If you undo any number of actions and then do a new action, all undone actions will become permanent, and cannot be redone.
